title: Spellbook of acid blast
data:
| [spellbook](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook") of +   acid blast   [![Light green spellbook.png](/images/7/7d/Light_green_spellbook.png)](/wiki/File:Light_green_spellbook.png) |                                                               |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                                                | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance") |
|                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                               |
| Base price                                                                                                                                                                | 600 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                             |
| Weight                                                                                                                                                                    | [50](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                   |
| Turns to read                                                                                                                                                             | 36                                                            |
| Ink to write                                                                                                                                                              | [30–59](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker")                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                               |
| Spell type                                                                                                                                                                | [attack](/wiki/Attack_spells "Attack spells")                 |
| Level                                                                                                                                                                     | 6                                                             |
| Power cost                                                                                                                                                                | 30 [Pw](/wiki/Power "Power")                                  |
| Direction                                                                                                                                                                 | ray/distant                                                   |

The **spellbook of acid blast**, from [GruntHack](/wiki/GruntHack "GruntHack"), teaches the **acid blast** spell.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Effects](#Effects)

  - [1.1 Unskilled / basic](#Unskilled_.2F_basic)
  - [1.2 Skilled / expert](#Skilled_.2F_expert)

- [2 See also](#See_also)

## Effects

### Unskilled / basic

At unskilled or basic skill, poison blast generates a [ray](/wiki/Ray "Ray") akin to the acid blast of a [yellow dragon](/wiki/Yellow_dragon "Yellow dragon"); it deals ([xplev](/wiki/XL "XL")/2+1)d6 damage to non-[acid resistant](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance") targets and [corrodes](/wiki/Erosion "Erosion") weapon and armor on an independent 1-in-6 chance for each.

### Skilled / expert

At skilled and expert level, the spell may be targeted at a location no more than 10 squares away that is in sight and an open space. The explosion cannot be cast underwater or on the Plane of Water; if used while swallowed, it is automatically cast on your own location.

Two to nine explosions are generated; the first is centered at the target location, and subsequent explosions are randomly placed on any of the nine squares around that point (unless swallowed). Each explosion deals damage as the unskilled/basic spell; only the damage is dealt, and weapons and armor are not eroded.

## See also

- [Spellbook of fireball](/wiki/Spellbook_of_fireball "Spellbook of fireball")
- [Spellbook of cone of cold](/wiki/Spellbook_of_cone_of_cold "Spellbook of cone of cold")

Skilled / expert

At skilled and expert level, the spell may be targeted at a location no more than 10 squares away that is in sight and an open space. The explosion cannot be cast underwater or on the Plane of Water; if used while swallowed, it is automatically cast on your own location.

Two to nine explosions are generated; the first is centered at the target location, and subsequent explosions are randomly placed on any of the nine squares around that point (unless swallowed). Each explosion deals damage as the unskilled/basic spell; only the damage is dealt, and weapons and armor are not eroded.

At skilled and expert level, the spell may be targeted at a location no more than 10 squares away that is in sight and an open space. The explosion cannot be cast underwater or on the Plane of Water; if used while swallowed, it is automatically cast on your own location.

Two to nine explosions are generated; the first is centered at the target location, and subsequent explosions are randomly placed on any of the nine squares around that point (unless swallowed).  Each explosion deals damage as the unskilled/basic spell; only the damage is dealt, and weapons and armor are not eroded.
